thread.title: Leslie Miertl
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Leslie Miertl

author: Leslie Miertl
title: Leslie Miertl
text:
We will definitely recommend Gsrden White to all of our family & friends!!
Lenny was very helpful & very polite, was also helpful with the furniture after we told Lenny what we want in color, style, price wise!!
LENNY & the drivers were VERY AWESOME!!
